title: Border, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of laid cords with needle lace (reticella style), edge of punto in aria
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Wide border of squares bordered at both sides by narrow strips and edged at one side by large, rounded pendants. Modes: portes, brides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, late 16th–early 17th century.
